writer.name: 纳塔莉·泰尔林克 Nathalie Teirlinck

director.name: 纳塔莉·泰尔林克 Nathalie Teirlinck

introduction: A lively children’s party at a beautiful mansion. Pauline, a little introvert girl, doesn’t seem to belong there. Slowly, a subtle threat is creeping into the party. In clinical, almost colorless surroundings, Pauline fights fractions of this memory. How these smolder in her head, in her sensory perception of present, past and what’s in betweenDownload Links:http://rapidshare.com/files/207817638/Anemone.avi.001.htmlhttp://rapidshare.com/files/207816232/Anemone.avi.002.htmlhttp://rapidshare.com/files/207816216/en.srt.htmlRar Password: NoneEnglish subs included
